tool_description: An API showing all the latest news of Bitcoin around the world from all the major websites
title: Bitcoin News

api_list.name: Get All Bitcoin News
api_list.description: This endpoint will return back all the news across all the major bitcoin news site from all over the world
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://bitcoin-news1.p.rapidapi.com/news"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "bitcoin-news1.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Individual Bitcoin News Sources
api_list.description: In this endpoint you can get informations for a specific News resource.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://bitcoin-news1.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "bitcoin-news1.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
